aboutme: I spent my time today creating this terminal-like app for you ;). It's not much but I thought you'd like having a little gift for our 8 month, and so here is a CS project for you my love. 🌟💖
love: I love you so so so so so so so soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo much. You don't even know how much it means to me when you're there for me and you're just there by my side. I want to be with you forever and ever. And I can't wait to marry you and have kids with you and have the best future with you! 💓✨
secret: Here’s a secret just for you: You are my sunshine. My only sunshine. You make me happyyyy when skies are gray. You never know dearrrrr how much I loveee youuu. So don't take my sunshineeee awayyyy. 💌😊
anniversary: Happy 8-month anniversary, my love! Every moment with you has been pure magic. Can’t wait for more laughs, adventures, and memories to share. I love you🌹
future: I can’t wait to spend forever with you—sharing endless love, joy, and laughter. From quiet nights to grand adventures, we will build the most beautiful future together. 💕✨
hug:
🤗 Here is a virtual hug just for you. I'm so grateful to have you in my life. You're amazing! 💞

   (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ
song: 🎶 Here is a song that I think you'll like, it personally reminds me of you :). The song(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ&ab_channel=RickAstley)💃💖
showerthoughts: I think about you so much. It might be an addiction..... Who knows but, I feel so lucky to have you in my life. 💫
joke: Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts! Hahahahhaha ha ha ha ha...... yeah I know it's a bad joke...
foryou: Thanks for always being there for me. You make life so much better just by being you. 💖✨
randomfact: Did you know? Octopuses have 3 hearts! Just thought you'd like to know something cool, hehe 😏 Yk if I was an octopus, all three of those hearts would belong to you 💓💓💓
quote: 'Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.' - Aristotle 💖
apologies: I'm sorry for not having more commands... I spent most of my time coding everything else...😭
